issue.title: [Python] Periodic documentation Sphinx build failure
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4136](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4136). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Been seeing this failure sometimes

```Java

   Warning, treated as error:
   /home/travis/build/apache/arrow/docs/source/python/benchmarks.rst:53:Unknown directive type "asv".
```
